## Access Request Details

**Intended use**: [Describe what you plan to do with GitHub access]

**Role requested**: 
- [ ] **Viewer** - Read and download access only
- [ ] **Contributor** - Ability to suggest changes via pull requests

**Project context**: [Brief description of the project/research you're working on]

## Security Acknowledgments

I understand and agree to the following policies:

- [ ] I will **NEVER** upload patient data (PHI) or personal information (PII)
- [ ] I will **NEVER** store passwords, API keys, or credentials in GitHub
- [ ] I will **complete data classification** before creating repositories
- [ ] I will **report security incidents** immediately to GitHub Tech Managers
- [ ] I understand my **GitHub activity may be monitored** for compliance

## For Reviewers Only

**Review Checklist:**
- [ ] Complete information provided
- [ ] Quiz score verified (80%+)
- [ ] Supervisor approval confirmed  
- [ ] Technical setup verified (2FA, institutional email)
- [ ] Appropriate role requested
- [ ] Business justification acceptable

**Decision:**
- [ ] Approved
- [ ] Denied - see comments for reasons
- [ ] Pending - additional information needed
